Shows the dislike count of videos using the Return YouTube Dislike API.
Return YouTube Dislike now support Shorts videos. It also shows the dislike count of shorts video using the RYD API.
It counts dislikes as a percentage of the number.

Integrates SponsorBlock which allows skipping undesired video segments, such as sponsored content.
Shows Skip button instead of Skip segment button.
Will not show a skip button when skipping a segment.

l: Show a toast when skipping automatically
p: You can choose SponsorBlock segment show a toast or not.

You can change behavior of different segments. for example: Skip automatically, Skip automatically once, Show a skip button, Show a in seek bar, Disable or you can change the segment color of your choice.
If you find a video with any of SponsorBlock's segment category, you can add a new segment.
💡 You Can visit SponsorBlock website for detail info

Get MicroG, which is necessary for using the non-root version of YT RVX / YT Music RVX.
or
(🇬) What is mMicroG (GmsCore)?
➥ 1. VancedMicroG has been completely discontinued. Therefore, mMicroG will replace the role of VancedMicroG
➥ 2. mMicroG is not based on TeamVanced/VancedMicroG. Instead, it is based on microg/GmsCore.
➥ 3. mMicroG has minimal changes for non-root users in microg/GmsCore.
➥ 4. For compatibility with ReVanced and ReVanced Extended, mMicroG uses the same package name as VancedMicroG: com.mgoogle.android.gms
